body:
Hello @bluebill1049 
Could you please give a version in which you've fixed it ? 
Thank you

Hello @bluebill1049 
It works for me, thanks. 
Could you please let me know the main version that will contain this fix ? I guess it's `6.15.2`, right ? 
Thank you

issue.title: Bump react-hook-form from 6.15.1 to 6.15.4

issue.body:
Bumps [react-hook-form](https://github.com/react-hook-form/react-hook-form) from 6.15.1 to 6.15.4.
Release notes

Sourced from react-hook-form's releases.

Version 6.15.4

üêû fix missing key for useFieldArray test üêû fix #4259 correct unset on field array values (#4262)
üêû fix #4260 watch missing type for undefined as the first argument (#4261)

v6.15.3

üêû fix #4251 issue with re-render during unmount field array (#4252) üôèüèª fix: the issue of unmounted component trying to set state after reset for field arrays (#4150)
